sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS To Be Held April 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On Thursday, April 27, 2017, HCA Holdings, Inc. will hold its annual meeting of stockholders at its corporate headquarters located at One Park Plaza, Nashville, Tennessee 37203.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will begin at 2:00 p.m. (CDT), and is being held for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect eleven nominees for director of the Company, nominated by the Board of Directors, with each director to serve until the 2018 annual meeting of the stockholders of the Company or until such directors respective successor is duly elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To approve, in an advisory (non-binding) vote, the compensation of the Companys named executive officers as described in the accompanying proxy statement (say-on-pay);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To approve an amendment to the Companys amended and restated certificate of incorporation to allow certain stockholders to request special meetings of stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To consider and vote upon a stockholder proposal regarding special shareowner meetings, if properly presented; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any postponement or adjournment of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders that owned our common stock at the close of business on March 7, 2017 are entitled to notice of and may vote at this meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A list of our stockholders of record will be available at our corporate headquarters located at One Park Plaza, Nashville, Tennessee 37203, during ordinary business hours, for 10 days prior to the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: References to HCA, the Company, we, us, or our in this notice and the accompanying proxy statement refer to HCA Holdings, Inc. and its applicable affiliates unless otherwise indicated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHETHER OR NOT YOU PLAN TO ATTEND THE MEETING IN PERSON, TO ENSURE THE PRESENCE OF A QUORUM, PLEASE VOTE OVER THE INTERNET OR BY TELEPHONE AS INSTRUCTED IN THESE MATERIALS OR COMPLETE, DATE, AND SIGN A PROXY CARD AS PROMPTLY AS POSSIBLE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IF YOU ATTEND THE MEETING AND WISH TO VOTE YOUR SHARES PERSONALLY, YOU MAY DO SO AT ANY TIME BEFORE THE PROXY IS EXERCISED.

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHEN WAS THIS PROXY STATEMENT FIRST MAILED OR MADE AVAILABLE TO STOCKHOLDERS?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    This proxy statement was first mailed or made available to stockholders on or about March 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders is being mailed or made available with this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual report is not part of the proxy solicitation materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:    WHY DID I RECEIVE A ONE-PAGE NOTICE IN THE MAIL REGARDING THE INTERNET AVAILABILITY OF PROXY MATERIALS INSTEAD OF A FULL SET OF PROXY MATERIALS?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Pursuant to rules adopted by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the Company has elected to provide access to our proxy materials and annual report over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending to our stockholders of record and beneficial owners a notice of Internet availability of the proxy materials instead of sending a paper copy of the proxy materials and annual report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders receiving the notice will have the ability to access the proxy materials and annual report on a website referenced in the notice or to request a printed set of the proxy materials and annual report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials and annual report over the Internet or to request a printed copy may be found in the notice and in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the notice contains instructions on how you may request to receive our proxy materials and annual report in printed form by mail or electronically on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    At the annual meeting, stockholders will act upon the following matters outlined in the notice of meeting on the cover page of this proxy statement: the election of each of the directors nominated by the Board of Directors; the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017; an advisory resolution to approve our executive compensation as described in this proxy statement (say-on-pay); the approval of an amendment to the Companys amended and restated certificate of incorporation to allow certain stockholders to request special meetings of stockholders; and the consideration and vote upon a stockholder proposal regarding special shareowner meetings, if properly presented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, following the formal business of the meeting, our management team will be available to respond to questions from our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHO MAY ATTEND THE ANNUAL MEETING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Stockholders of record as of the close of business on March 7, 2017, or their duly appointed proxies, may attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street name holders (those whose shares are held through a broker or other nominee) should bring a copy of a brokerage statement reflecting their ownership of our common stock as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Space limitations may make it necessary to limit attendance to stockholders and valid picture identification may be required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cameras, recording devices, and other electronic devices are not permitted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company may implement additional procedures to ensure the comfort and safety of meeting attendees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registration will begin at 1:00 p.m. (CDT), and the annual meeting will commence at 2:00 p.m. (CDT).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHO IS ENTITLED TO VOTE AT THE ANNUAL MEETING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Only stockholders of record as of the close of business on March 7, 2017 are entitled to receive notice of and participate in the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date, there were 370,440,793 shares of our common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every stockholder is entitled to one vote for each share held as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cumulative voting is not permitted with respect to the election of directors or any other matter to be considered at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHO IS SOLICITING MY VOTE?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    The Companys Board of Directors is sending you this proxy statement in connection with the solicitation of proxies for use at the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company pays the cost of soliciting proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may be solicited in person or by telephone, facsimile, electronic mail, or other electronic medium by certain of our directors, officers, and employees, without additional compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we have retained Georgeson LLC to assist in the solicitation of proxies for a fee of approximately $15,000 plus associated costs and expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forms of proxies and proxy materials may also be distributed through brokers, custodians, and other like parties to the beneficial owners of shares of our common stock, in which case we will reimburse these parties for their reasonable out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  ON WHAT MAY I VOTE?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    You may vote on the election of directors nominated to serve on our Board of Directors; the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017; the advisory say-on-pay resolution to approve our executive compensation; the approval of an amendment to the Companys amended and restated certificate of incorporation to allow certain stockholders to request special meetings of stockholders; and the stockholder proposal regarding special shareowner meetings, if properly presented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   HOW DOES THE BOARD RECOMMEND I VOTE ON THE PROPOSALS?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   The Board unanimously recommends that you vote as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR each of the director nominees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the advisory say-on-pay resolution to approve our executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR approval of the amendment to the Companys amended and restated certificate of incorporation to allow certain stockholders to request special meetings of stockholders; and        AGAINST the stockholder proposal regarding special shareowner meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   HOW WILL VOTING ON ANY OTHER BUSINESS BE CONDUCTED?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:     It is not expected that any matter not referred to herein will be presented for action at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matters are properly brought before the annual meeting, including, without limitation, a motion to adjourn the annual meeting to another time and/or place for the purpose of, among other matters, permitting dissemination of information regarding material developments relating to any of the proposals or soliciting additional proxies in favor of the approval of any of the proposals, the persons named on the accompanying Proxy Card will vote the shares represented by such proxy upon such matters in their discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Should the annual meeting be reconvened, all proxies will be voted in the same manner as such proxies would have been voted when the annual meeting was originally convened, except for the proxies effectively revoked or withdrawn prior to the time proxies are voted at such reconvened meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   HOW DO I VOTE IF MY SHARES ARE REGISTERED DIRECTLY IN MY NAME?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:  You may vote in person at the annual meeting or authorize the persons named as proxies on the Proxy Card to vote your shares by returning the Proxy Card by mail, through the Internet, or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we offer four different voting methods, we encourage you to vote through the Internet as we believe it is the most cost-effective method for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also recommend that you vote as soon as possible, even if you are planning to attend the annual meeting, so that the vote count will not be delayed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both the Internet and the telephone provide convenient, cost-effective alternatives to returning your Proxy Card by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose to vote your shares through the Internet or by telephone, there is no need for you to mail back your Proxy Card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Vote Over the Internet:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Log on to the Internet and go to the website www.proxyvote.com (24 hours a day, 7 days a week).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have your Proxy Card available when you access the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number from your Proxy Card to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Vote By Telephone:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On a touch-tone telephone, call 1-800-690-6903 (24 hours a day, 7 days a week).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have your Proxy Card available when you make the call.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number from your Proxy Card to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Vote By Proxy Card:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Complete and sign the Proxy Card and return it to the address indicated on the Proxy Card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a notice of Internet availability of the proxy materials instead of a paper copy of the proxy materials and annual report, you should follow the voting instructions set forth in the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have the right to revoke your proxy at any time before the meeting by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) notifying our Corporate Secretary in writing at One Park Plaza, Nashville, Tennessee 37203;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) voting in person;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) submitting a later-dated Proxy Card;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) submitting another vote by telephone or over the Internet; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) if applicable, submitting new voting instructions to your broker or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have questions about how to vote or revoke your proxy, you should contact our Corporate Secretary at One Park Plaza, Nashville, Tennessee 37203.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shares held in street name, refer to Question 11.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  HOW DO I VOTE MY SHARES IF THEY ARE HELD IN THE NAME OF MY BROKER (STREET NAME)?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    If your shares are held by your broker or other nominee, often referred to as held in street name, you will receive a form from your broker or nominee seeking instruction as to how your shares should be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should contact your broker or other nominee with questions about how to provide or revoke your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHAT IS THE VOTE REQUIRED TO ELECT DIRECTORS?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Since Proposal 1 in this proxy statement is in respect of an uncontested director election, Proposal 1 requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the annual meeting to elect a nominee, which means that a nominee will be elected only if the number of shares voted for that nominee exceeds the number of shares voted against that nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, each nominee receiving a greater number of shares voted for such nominee than against such nominee shall be elected as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an incumbent director does not receive a greater number of shares voted for such director than against such director, then such director must tender his or her resignation to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee who is not an incumbent director does not receive a greater number of shares voted for such director than against such director, then such nominee will not be elected to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event there is a contested director election, director nominees must receive affirmative votes from a plurality of the votes cast at the annual meeting to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that the nominees receiving the greatest number of affirmative votes of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote will be elected as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  WHAT IS THE VOTE REQUIRED TO APPROVE THE OTHER PROPOSALS?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of Ernst & Young LLP: The ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017 must receive affirmative votes from the holders of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote to be approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Say-On-Pay Resolution: The advisory say-on-pay resolution to approve our executive compensation must receive affirmative votes from the holders of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote to be approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because your vote is advisory, it will not be binding on the Company, the Board of Directors, or our Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although non-binding, our Compensation Committee will review and consider the voting results when making future decisions regarding our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendment to the Companys Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation: The proposal to approve an amendment to the Companys Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to allow certain stockholders to request special meetings of stockholders must receive affirmative votes from the holders of at least seventy-five percent (75%) of the voting power of all outstanding shares of the Company entitled to vote generally in the election of directors to be approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposal Regarding Special Shareowner Meetings: The stockholder proposal regarding special shareowner meetings, if properly presented at the annual meeting, must receive affirmative votes from the holders of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote to be approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHAT CONSTITUTES A QUORUM?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    The presence at the meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the aggregate voting power of the common stock outstanding on the record date will constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There must be a quorum for business to be conducted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Failure of a quorum to be represented at the annual meeting will necessitate an adjournment or postponement and will subject the Company to additional expense.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are counted as present or represented for purposes of determining the presence or absence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHAT IF I ABSTAIN FROM VOTING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    If you attend the meeting or send in your signed Proxy Card, but abstain from voting on any proposal, you will still be counted for purposes of determining whether a quorum exists.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you abstain from voting on Proposal 1, your abstention will have no effect on the outcome.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you abstain from voting on Proposals 2, 3, 4 or 5, your abstention will have the same legal effect as a vote against these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:    WILL MY SHARES BE VOTED IF I DO NOT SIGN AND RETURN MY PROXY CARD OR VOTE BY TELEPHONE OR OVER THE INTERNET?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    If you are a registered stockholder and you do not sign and return your Proxy Card or vote by telephone or over the Internet, your shares will not be voted at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Questions concerning stock certificates and registered stockholders may be directed to Wells Fargo Shareowner Services at 1110 Centre Pointe Curve, Suite 101, Mendota Heights, Minnesota 55120-4100 or by telephone at 1-800-468-9716 (domestic) or 1-651-450-4064 (outside the U.S.).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name and you do not issue instructions to your broker, your broker may vote your shares at its discretion on routine matters, but may not vote your shares on non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) rules, Proposal 2 relating to the ratification of the appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm is deemed to be a routine matter and brokers and nominees may exercise their voting discretion without receiving instructions from the beneficial owner of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1, 3, 4 and 5 are non-routine matters and, therefore, may only be voted in accordance with instructions received from the beneficial owner of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHAT IS A BROKER NON-VOTE?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Under NYSE rules, brokers and nominees may exercise their voting discretion without receiving instructions from the beneficial owner of the shares on proposals that are deemed to be routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a proposal is a non-routine matter, a broker or nominee may not vote the shares on the proposal without receiving instructions from the beneficial owner of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a broker turns in a Proxy Card expressly stating that the broker is not voting on a non-routine matter, such action is referred to as a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHAT IS THE EFFECT OF A BROKER NON-VOTE?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Broker non-votes will be counted for the purpose of determining the presence of a quorum but will not be counted for purposes of determining the outcome of the vote on any proposal, other than Proposal 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHO WILL COUNT THE VOTES?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. has been engaged as our independent inspector of election to tabulate stockholder votes for the annual meeting.

sentences.text: Q:   CAN I PARTICIPATE IF I AM UNABLE TO ATTEND?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    If you are unable to attend the meeting in person, we encourage you to send in your Proxy Card or to vote by telephone or over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will provide a live webcast of the annual meeting accessible at https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The webcast will be one-way audio only, and webcast attendees will not be able to participate or vote at the meeting via the webcast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHERE CAN I FIND THE VOTING RESULTS OF THE ANNUAL MEETING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    We intend to announce preliminary voting results at the annual meeting and publish final results in a Current Report on Form 8-K that will be filed with the SEC following the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All reports we file with the SEC are publicly available when filed.

sentences.text: Q:    WHEN ARE STOCKHOLDER PROPOSALS DUE IN ORDER TO BE INCLUDED IN OUR PROXY MATERIALS FOR THE NEXT ANNUAL MEETING?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Any stockholder proposal must be submitted in writing to our Corporate Secretary at HCA Holdings, Inc., One Park Plaza, Nashville, Tennessee 37203, prior to the close of business on November 17, 2017, to be considered timely for inclusion in next years proxy statement and form of proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such proposal must also comply with SEC regulations, including Rule 14a-8 regarding the inclusion of stockholder proposals in company-sponsored proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   WHEN ARE OTHER STOCKHOLDER PROPOSALS DUE?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:    Our bylaws contain an advance notice provision that requires stockholders to deliver to us notice of a proposal to be considered at an annual meeting not less than ninety (90) nor more than one hundred twenty (120) days before the date of the first anniversary of the prior years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such proposals are also subject to informational and other requirements set forth in our bylaws, a copy of which is available under the Corporate Governance section of our website, www.hcahealthcare.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   HOW CAN I OBTAIN ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE COMPANY?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk is inherent with every business.

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the day-to-day management of risks the Company faces, while the Board of Directors, as a whole and through its committees, has responsibility for the oversight of risk management.

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors oversees an enterprise-wide approach to risk management, designed to support the achievement of organizational objectives, including strategic objectives, to improve long-term organizational performance and enhance stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A fundamental aspect of risk management is not only understanding the risks a company faces and what steps management is taking to manage those risks, but also understanding what level of risk is appropriate for the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The involvement of the full Board of Directors in setting our business strategy is a key part of its assessment of managements appetite for risk and also a determination of what constitutes an appropriate level of risk for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We conduct an annual enterprise risk management assessment, which is facilitated by our enterprise risk management team in collaboration with our internal auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The senior internal audit executive officer reports to the Chief Executive Officer and to the Audit and Compliance Committee in this capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this process, we assess risk throughout the Company by conducting surveys and interviews of our employees and directors, soliciting information regarding business risks that could significantly adversely affect the Company, including the achievement of its strategic plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We then identify any controls or initiatives in place to mitigate any material risk and the effectiveness of any such controls or initiatives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN
